name: Mad Monkey II
description:
After finding yourself ship recked on a deserted island, you encounter an angry ape who will only let you eat fruit that he throws. Navigate 10 levels of game play and survive by catching fruit. Tap on thought to be extinct animals for extra points.

-------- Update Info ----------

- updated to iOS 9.2
- fixed extra drop error
- removed cut scene
- capped speed for longer game play

-------- Game Features -------

- 10 levels of game play
- Smooth accelerometer based controls
- High Score Feature
- Hours of fun.
